record.title: EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - December 11, 2008)

[Page: S10909]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the period for the transaction of morning business be extended until 5 p.m., with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.
